author: Thomas Franklin Fairfax Millard
description: Spirit-forward, sweet and sour with rich grenadine balancing lemon sourness, laced with a trio of spirits.
name: Twelve Mile Limit
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
